languages.text: Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж теряет {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, его следующая атака в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} наносит +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} за каждые 2 потерянные единицы здоровья. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the character loses wounds, their next melee attack gains +1 damage for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.
Whenever the character loses wounds, their next melee attack gains +1 damage for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.

Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.

Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.

languages.text: Cuando el personaje pierde {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gana +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por cada 2 heridas perdidas. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el personaje pierde {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gana +1 de daño por cada 2 heridas perdidas. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を失った時、失った傷2につき次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+1増加する。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を失った時、失った傷2につき次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+1増加する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: 每当角色失去{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，每失去2点生命值，下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}就会额外造成1点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当角色失去{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，每失去2点生命值，下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}就会额外造成1点伤害。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Wenn der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, erhält sein nächster {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} für jeweils 2 Wunden, die der Charakter verloren hat. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verliert, erhält sein nächster {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} +1 Schaden pro 2 Wunden, die der Charakter verloren hat. Aufaddierbar.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le personnage perd des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de sa réserve, son {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante bénéficie de +1 point de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} par tranche de 2 blessures perdues. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le personnage perd des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de sa réserve, son {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante bénéficie de +1 point de dégât par tranche de 2 blessures perdues. Cumulable.

languages.text: Когда персонаж теряет {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, его следующая атака в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} наносит +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} за каждые 2 потерянные единицы здоровья. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the character loses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, their next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for every 2 wounds the character has lost. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж теряет {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, его следующая {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака в ближнем бою{/g} наносит +1 урон за каждые 2 потерянные единицы здоровья. Эффект суммируется.

Когда персонаж теряет {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, его следующая {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}атака в ближнем бою{/g} наносит +1 урон за каждые 2 потерянные единицы здоровья. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: Karakter her {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} kaybettiğinde bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}, karakterin kaybettiği her 2 sağlık puanı için +1 ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
